name: .P5P
summary: Learn about .P5P files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open P5P files with IPS tools included with Oracle Solaris, such as the pkg command. With these tools, you can install, verify, or remove the software contained within the P5P archive.
To use a P5P file in the Oracle Solaris environment, you typically import it into a local package repository or install the package directly. For example, you can run:
